quotes: A path is made by walking on it.
Instead of thinking about what you are going to do when you retire, think about how you can do that now and make a living from it.
First learn the meaning of what you say, and then speak.
When you've got nothing, you've got nothing to lose.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
What we know is a drop, what we don't know is an ocean.
an action committed in anger is an action doomed to failure.
All power is from within and therefore under our control.
The businessman's tool is value.
An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.
Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
Coming together is a beginning, staying together is progress, and working together is success.
Be as simple as you can be; you will be astonished to see how uncomplicated and happy your life can become.
The mind can calculate, but the spirit yearns, and the heart wants what the heart wants.
Not all those who wander are lost.
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
In order to be walked over, you have to be lying down.
First comes the shy wish. Then you must have the heart to have the dream. Then, you work, and work.
When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
To know your Enemy, you must become your Enemy.
Walk towards the sunshine, and the shadows will fall behind you.
You live by what you thrill to, and there's the end of it.
Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.
Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
Obstacles don't block the path, they are the path.
Your neighbor is the man who needs you.
Pleasure is always derived from something outside you, whereas joy arises from within.
Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
Forgive those who have hurt you.
It is often safer to be in chains than to be free.
The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.
Freeing oneself from words is liberation.
Nothing is hopeless; we must hope for everything.
When you get up in the morning, you have two choices - either to be happy or to be unhappy. Just choose to be happy.
Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.
If the happiness and prosperity of other people depend on you, you have nothing to fear anymore.
Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
Most great people have achieved their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
Success is good at any age, but the sooner you find it, the longer you will enjoy it.
I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully.
Be royal in your own fashion: act like a king to be treated like one.
A thing must be loved before it is lovable.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
